There is no results found in the response
You already have the latest wallpaper
No more wallpapers in the gallery
I can not set the MTG wallpaper: %1$s
I could not find the Image View

About

The main idea of the app is to update phone wallpapers automatically when there is new art on the wizards site.

The general scenario is to open the application, switch \"Update Automatically\" and that\'s all. Wizards site trivially updates once a week, but time is not guaranteed and could be different, so it just checks the availability of the new wallpaper once a day.

I wish to see the original wizard\'s application for this task, but there is no one, so I did this.

The gallery part allows you to browse the MTG wallpapers more conveniently than on the site. Still, this is not the primary part of this application, so it is not rich.

The wallpapers for a phone and a tablet (diagonal is more than 6.5 inch) are different - the "Mobile" and the "Tablet" versions accordingly.
